name: FTP
description: Upload or Download using File Transfer Protocol

params.name: host
params.description: Host name or IP address of FTP server

params.name: port
params.description: Port on which FTP server listens (commonly 21)

params.name: useTls
params.description: Connect to the FTP server using TLS protocol.

params.name: localPath
params.description: Path on Kaholo agent to existing file or directory to upload

params.name: remotePath
params.description: Path on FTP server to which file or directory is to be uploaded

params.name: verboseMode
params.description: Display verbose messages as the FTP process progresses.

params.name: remotePath
params.description: Path of file or directory on the FTP server to be removed

params.name: verboseMode
params.description: Display verbose messages as the FTP process progresses.

params.name: remotePath
params.description: Path of existing File or Directory on FTP server to download

params.name: localPath
params.description: Path on Kaholo agent of file or directory to which to download

params.name: verboseMode
params.description: Display verbose messages as the FTP process progresses.

params.name: remotePath
params.description: Path on FTP server to list

params.name: verboseMode
params.description: Display verbose log messages providing additional FTP connection info.
